title: Dirty Diana Recipe
full_text:
Dirty Diana Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
3 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
1 1/2
ounces
Pyrat XO Reserve rum
or other
aged rum
3/4
ounce
freshly-squeezed
lime juice
3/4
ounce
dark agave nectar
1 1/2
ounces
freshly-squeezed
grapefruit juice
Dash
peach bitters
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add rum, lime juice, agave, grapefruit juice, and bitters and shake well. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Rum
